item.title: Static Page List: This plugin displays a configurable list of the static pages.
item.author: Rob Antonishen, Falk Doering, Ian (Timbalu)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_staticpage
Static Page List
This plugin displays a configurable list of the static pages.
For: Serendipity 1.3

item.title: Weather: Display the current weather in the sidebar.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_weather
Weather
Display the current weather in the sidebar.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Authors login: Show a login form for authors
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Neil Dudman
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_loginform
Authors login
Show a login form for authors
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Amazon Recommendations: Recommend Products at Amazon within the Amazon-Partnerprogram
item.author: Matthew Groeninger, (original plugin by Thomas Nesges)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_amazon
Amazon Recommendations
Recommend Products at Amazon within the Amazon-Partnerprogram
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Last Search (Google, Yahoo, Bing, Scroogle): Shows searched word of the last Google, Yahoo, Bing or Scoogle search, that lead to this blog.
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Grischa Brockhaus
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_google_last_query
Last Search (Google, Yahoo, Bing, Scroogle)
Shows searched word of the last Google, Yahoo, Bing or Scoogle search, that lead to this blog.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Hitmaps: Shows where the blogs visitors are coming from
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_hitmaps
Hitmaps
Shows where the blogs visitors are coming from
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Top Referers: Arată siturile care au legătură la blogul tău
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_topreferers
Top Referers
Arată siturile care au legătură la blogul tău
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Wikipedia Finder: Highlight a phrase and click the icon to search on using Wikipedia.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_wikipedia_finder
Wikipedia Finder
Highlight a phrase and click the icon to search on using Wikipedia.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Show tagged entries: Shows a list of existing tags for entries
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Jonathan Arkell, Grischa Brockhaus, Lars Strojny
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_freetag
Show tagged entries
Shows a list of existing tags for entries
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Choose Language: Allows visitors to change the frontend interface language
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Wesley Hwang-Chung
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_multilingual
Choose Language
Allows visitors to change the frontend interface language
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Popular Entries: Shows the titles and number of comments of the most popular entries calculated according to the entries most commented on.
item.author: Kaustubh Srikanth
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_popularentries
Popular Entries
Shows the titles and number of comments of the most popular entries calculated according to the entries most commented on.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: A del.icio.us plug-in: A clone of the "Remaindered Links" & "Blogmarks" systems, and uses the trendy del.icio.us for its back-end support.
item.author: Riscky
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_delicious
A del.icio.us plug-in
A clone of the "Remaindered Links" & "Blogmarks" systems, and uses the trendy del.icio.us for its back-end support.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Category Tree Menu: DHTML category menu. Requires PEAR::HTML_TreeMenu.
item.author: Jackson Miller, Sebastian Bauer
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_category_dhtml_menu
Category Tree Menu
DHTML category menu. Requires PEAR::HTML_TreeMenu.
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Photoblog Entries: Shows the thumbnails of the most recent photoblog entries (see event plugin).
item.author: Cameron MacFarland
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_photoblog
Photoblog Entries
Shows the thumbnails of the most recent photoblog entries (see event plugin).
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: User Self-Registration: Allows blog visitors to create their own author account. Together with the Event-plugin (index.php?serendipity[subpage]=adduser) you can choose whether only registered users may post comments.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_adduser
User Self-Registration
Allows blog visitors to create their own author account. Together with the Event-plugin (index.php?serendipity[subpage]=adduser) you can choose whether only registered users may post comments.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Authors: Displays entries by author.
item.author: Victor Fusco
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_authors
Authors
Displays entries by author.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Link List: Links manager - Shows your favorite links in the sidebar.
item.author: Matthew Groeninger, Omid Mottaghi Rad
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_linklist
Link List
Links manager - Shows your favorite links in the sidebar.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Guestbook Sidebar: Display the latest guestbook items in the sidebar
item.author: Jaap Boerma ( j@webbict.com ), Tadashi Jokagi <elf2000@users.sourceforge.net>, Ian (Timbalu)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_guestbook
Guestbook Sidebar
Display the latest guestbook items in the sidebar
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: flickr Photostream: Display the latest photos from flickr Photostreams.
item.author: Michael Kaiser
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_flickr
flickr Photostream
Display the latest photos from flickr Photostreams.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Polls: Shows the current poll in your sidebar
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Evan Nemerson
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_pollbox
Polls
Shows the current poll in your sidebar
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Gallery Random Photo Block: Adds a reference to a Gallery Random Block script (see http://gallery.menalto.com for details on this script)
item.author: Andrew Brown, Tadashi Jokagi
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_gallery_menalto_random
Gallery Random Photo Block
Adds a reference to a Gallery Random Block script (see http://gallery.menalto.com for details on this script)
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Serendipity Authors: Shows a list for all Authors
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_userprofiles
Serendipity Authors
Shows a list for all Authors
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Birthdays of users: PLUGIN_USERPROFILES_BIRTHDAYSNAME_DESCRIPTION
item.author: Falk Doering
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_userprofiles_birthdays
Birthdays of users
PLUGIN_USERPROFILES_BIRTHDAYSNAME_DESCRIPTION
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: My Calendar: Shows your personal calendar with X upcoming scheduled events
item.author: Garvin Hicking, Markus Gerstel
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_mycalendar
My Calendar
Shows your personal calendar with X upcoming scheduled events
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Karma Ranking: Shows overall score by author
item.author: Andreas Brandmaier
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_karmaranking
Karma Ranking
Shows overall score by author
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Coppermine Thumbnails: Display thumbnails from a Coppermine gallery in the sidebar
item.author: Matthew Maude
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_coppermine
Coppermine Thumbnails
Display thumbnails from a Coppermine gallery in the sidebar
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Show trusted users: Displays all users with their ethics (represented by a traffic light). Green light means 'cool'; yellow light means 'warning'; red light means 'banned' The administrator can easily modify this value for each user.
item.author: Loris Zena
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_xsstrust
Show trusted users
Displays all users with their ethics (represented by a traffic light). Green light means 'cool'; yellow light means 'warning'; red light means 'banned' The administrator can easily modify this value for each user.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Language-Specific HTML Nugget: Shows an HTML nugget on the sidebar, for a specific language.
item.author: Wesley Hwang-Chung
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_nugget_multilingual
Language-Specific HTML Nugget
Shows an HTML nugget on the sidebar, for a specific language.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Currently...: Displays items you are currently listening, playing, or reading...
item.author: Dustin Hawkins
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_currently
Currently...
Displays items you are currently listening, playing, or reading...
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Audioscrobbler: Shows last played songs in your blog
item.author: Flo Solcher
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_audioscrobbler
Audioscrobbler
Shows last played songs in your blog
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Random Quotes: Shows a block with a random quotation
item.author: Florian Solcher
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_randomquotes
Random Quotes
Shows a block with a random quotation
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Shoutcast: Display Shoutcast stream information in the sidebar.
item.author: John Mann
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_shoutcast
Shoutcast
Display Shoutcast stream information in the sidebar.
For: Serendipity 0.8.4

item.title: Google Căutare rapidă: Caută după o intrare (Google)
item.author: Wesley Hwang-Chung
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_google_quicksearch
Google Căutare rapidă
Caută după o intrare (Google)
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Geotag Google/OSM Map: This plugin displays a Google Map or Openstreetmap with geotagged entries
item.author: Zoran Kovacevic, Grischa Brockhaus, Matthias Gutjahr
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_geotag
Geotag Google/OSM Map
This plugin displays a Google Map or Openstreetmap with geotagged entries
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Google PageRank: Dynamic display of Google PageRank
item.author: Christian Lescuyer
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_pagerank
Google PageRank
Dynamic display of Google PageRank
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Timezones: Shows the time of up to four timezones
item.author: Christoph Eunicke <s9y-plugin@eunicke.org>
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_timezones
Timezones
Shows the time of up to four timezones
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Show Entries in sidebar: Shows entries of special categories in your sidebar. Good for Sidebar Moblogging!
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_showentries
Show Entries in sidebar
Shows entries of special categories in your sidebar. Good for Sidebar Moblogging!
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Average Rating: Shows top-rated movies by their average rating
item.author: Lewe Zipfel, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_communityrating
Average Rating
Shows top-rated movies by their average rating
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: FAQs Category Chooser: Choose the categories you will display on the blog.
item.author: Falk Doering
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_faq
FAQs Category Chooser
Choose the categories you will display on the blog.
For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: SmileTag shoutbox: Uses the SmileTag shoutbox inside your sidebar. SmileTag itself is not distributed with this plugin.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_smiletag
SmileTag shoutbox
Uses the SmileTag shoutbox inside your sidebar. SmileTag itself is not distributed with this plugin.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: Quick Link: Displays a box for quick links
item.author: Omid Mottaghi Rad
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_quicklink
Quick Link
Displays a box for quick links
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Unified Sidebar Image Display: Offers the ability to display images in the sidebar. The source of the images is configurable. The plugin is able to connect to a Menalto Gallery installs "random" url, access a Coppermine database directory (MySql only), connect to the web service Zooomr (http://beta.zooomr.com/home) or access images in the Serendipity Media Library.
item.author: Andrew Brown (Menalto code), Matthew Groeninger (Unified/Media Lib. Code), Stefan Lange-Hegermann (Zooomr Code), Matthew Maude (Coppermine code)
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_imagesidebar
Unified Sidebar Image Display
Offers the ability to display images in the sidebar. The source of the images is configurable. The plugin is able to connect to a Menalto Gallery installs "random" url, access a Coppermine database directory (MySql only), connect to the web service Zooomr (http://beta.zooomr.com/home) or access images in the Serendipity Media Library.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: PLUGIN_ZOOOMR_NAME: Display the most recent pictures of any Zooomr Feed
item.author: Stefan Lange-Hegermann
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_zooomr
PLUGIN_ZOOOMR_NAME
Display the most recent pictures of any Zooomr Feed
For: Serendipity 1.0

item.title: Social Bookmarks Plugin: A plugin to display bookmarks from a social bookmark service (del.icio.us, ma.gnolia, furl.net, linkroll, Mister Wong) via an RSS feed.
item.author: Matthias Gutjahr
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_socialbookmarks
Social Bookmarks Plugin
A plugin to display bookmarks from a social bookmark service (del.icio.us, ma.gnolia, furl.net, linkroll, Mister Wong) via an RSS feed.
For: Serendipity 0.9alpha5

item.title: Upcoming Events: Display upcoming and recommended events in the sidebar and apply the hCalendar microformat to them.
item.author: Matthias Gutjahr
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_microformats
Upcoming Events
Display upcoming and recommended events in the sidebar and apply the hCalendar microformat to them.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Flickr badge: Shows your last photos on Flickr.com
item.author: Lars Strojny
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_flickrbadge
Flickr badge
Shows your last photos on Flickr.com
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: On »Heavy Rotation«: This plugin displays an album cover from last.fm which was on Heavy Rotation (top album) in the last week
item.author: Lars Strojny
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_heavyrotation
On »Heavy Rotation«
This plugin displays an album cover from last.fm which was on Heavy Rotation (top album) in the last week
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: External PHP Application: Shows an external PHP application inside your blog with your blogs design and all formattings. USE WITH CARE, THIS PLUGIN HAS SECURITY IMPLICATIONS AS IT INCLUDES ANY GENERIC PHP FILE! YOU CAN ONLY USE THIS PLUGIN AS ADMIN!
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_externalphp
External PHP Application
Shows an external PHP application inside your blog with your blogs design and all formattings. USE WITH CARE, THIS PLUGIN HAS SECURITY IMPLICATIONS AS IT INCLUDES ANY GENERIC PHP FILE! YOU CAN ONLY USE THIS PLUGIN AS ADMIN!
For: Serendipity 0.7

item.title: Gadu-Gadu IM status description: Gets and displays a status description of Gadu-Gadu IM
item.author: Piotr Borys
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_ggopis
Gadu-Gadu IM status description
Gets and displays a status description of Gadu-Gadu IM
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: Feedburner Sidebar: Adds assorted functionality of the feedburner service into the sidebar.
item.author: Aaron Axelsen
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_feedburnersidebar
Feedburner Sidebar
Adds assorted functionality of the feedburner service into the sidebar.
For: Serendipity 1.2.1

item.title: Twitter Timeline: Show your current Twitter entries
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus, Damian Luszczymak, Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_twitter
Twitter Timeline
Show your current Twitter entries
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: SideBar Logo 0.0.2: Displays a panel containing your logo, site name, and other relevant informaion about your site.
item.author: Adam Krause
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_sidebarlogo
SideBar Logo 0.0.2
Displays a panel containing your logo, site name, and other relevant informaion about your site.
For: Serendipity 0.9

item.title: AdSense: Displays adverts from Google.
item.author: Jim Dabell
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_google_adsense
AdSense
Displays adverts from Google.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: WebPasties: WebPasties allow you to manage things like RSS feeds, polls, event calendars, and IM status buttons. (stackable)
item.author: Jabrwock
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_webpasties
WebPasties
WebPasties allow you to manage things like RSS feeds, polls, event calendars, and IM status buttons. (stackable)
For: Serendipity 0.9.1

item.title: Frappr (Friend Mapper): Display link to your Frappr map and recently added Frappr avatars. (stackable)
item.author: Jabrwock
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_frappr
Frappr (Friend Mapper)
Display link to your Frappr map and recently added Frappr avatars. (stackable)
For: Serendipity 0.9.1

item.title: Spam Report: Prints out a statistic about your comment spam if your antispam plugins report to the DB.
item.author: Grischa Brockhaus, Janek Bevendorff
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_spamblock_bee
Spam Report
Prints out a statistic about your comment spam if your antispam plugins report to the DB.
For: Serendipity 0.8

item.title: IPv6 Check: This plugin displays within a sidebar element the IP version used for accessing the website.
item.author: Pascal Uhlmann
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_ipv6
IPv6 Check
This plugin displays within a sidebar element the IP version used for accessing the website.
For: Serendipity 0.8
